text: Franz Reuther (18 July 1941 â€“ 23 January 2024), better known as Frank Farian, was a German record producer and songwriter. He is best known as founder of the 1970s disco group Boney M. He created the group Milli Vanilli. He has also been associated with other music groups. He was born in Kirn, Germany. Farian died in Miami on 23 January 2024, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German musicians Category:People from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:German record producers Category:German songwriters
title: Frank Farian
